description: The giant hands statue from Gangnam Style music video. A must-visit photo spot for K-pop fans.
SM Ent. flagship and virtual experience center featuring aespa's metaverse concept.
Official museum for BTS and HYBE artists. Interactive exhibits and exclusive content.
Seasonal NCT-themed interactive space with exclusive merchandise and photo opportunities.
Official pop-up store for album releases and limited edition merchandise.
Official YG artist merchandise shop with BLACKPINK exclusive items.
Cafe inside JYP building with star videos and TWICE-themed drinks.
Watch K-pop cover dances every night by talented street performers.
Permanent spot commemorating SEVENTEEN concerts with fan messages.
NewJeans characters and merch pop-up store with exclusive collaborations.
SM Entertainment's cultural complex with Red Velvet exhibitions and cafe.
EXO-themed attractions and rides at Lotte World theme park.
Scenic spot featured in IU's music videos with breathtaking city views.
G-DRAGON's fashion brand flagship store in Hannam-dong.
K-pop dance classes and workshops in the heart of Hongdae.
Temporary pop-up cafe with ENHYPEN-themed menu and merchandise.
Colorful graffiti wall dedicated to ITZY with fan art and messages.
Special reading area inspired by TXT's dreamy concept in Starfield Library.
Take photos in front of the iconic SM Entertainment building where NCT 127 was born.
Exhibition space dedicated to SHINee with memorabilia and interactive displays.
Main hall where Super Junior and other SM artists hold fan meetings and events.
Gangnam K-Star Road featuring Girls' Generation bear statues and handprints.
Dedicated area for Big Bang on K-Star Road with exclusive merchandise.
Interactive metaverse experience featuring aespa's virtual world concept.
Limited-time pop-up store for ATEEZ albums and exclusive Gangnam station merchandise.
Venue where TREASURE and other K-pop groups hold large-scale concerts.
Concert hall hosting Dreamcatcher and various idol group performances.
Special STAYC-themed ride and photo zones within Lotte World Adventure.
Popular busking location where (G)I-DLE and other idols perform street shows.
